Enum ResourceSearcher

  • java.lang.Object

extends Enum<ResourceSearcher>
    Implements class and resources searching logic.

        public void resetCache(String directory)

        Parameters:
        directory - Name of the directory

      • search

        public SearchResult search(List<String> directories,
                  String pattern)
                    throws PatternException
        This method performs a cached search in the selected directories for the file name pattern passed as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        directories - List of directories to search into. This list will limit the results of the search, even if there are any more directories in the caché
        pattern - File name pattern
        Returns:
        Search result, with the search pattern used and a list of results, grouped by file and indexed by directory. For example:
        pattern -> "util"
        returns -> [ "/full/path/to" -> [ "/full/path/to/someJar.jar" -> [ "org/apache/commons/BeanUtils.class", "org/apache/commons/BeanUtilsBean.class", "org/apache/commons/BeanUtilsBean2.class", ... ] ], [ "/full/path/to/my_library.jar" -> [ "my/class/utilities/another_class.class" ]], [ ... ] ]
        Throws:
        PatternException - If the pattern is not valid
